main: {status:Discard}s skills to set his {status:KnowledgeExplored} to the rank of the discarded skill. S1 gains Clash Power and Coin Reuse, and S2 and S3 gain Coin Power depending on the value.
other: You can use the discard trick if you want him to preserve his {status:KnowledgeExplored} level. Generate his defense skill, then use the skill that wasn't replaced. This prevents him from discarding any skill.
His passive gives him {status:AttackDmgUp} when discarding skills and when an ally discards a skill of a rank higher than his {status:KnowledgeExplored}, he gains +1 stack.

1060801.desc: When Discarding a Skill, gain [AttackDmgUp] equal to the Discarded Skill's Rank. (Max 3 per turn)
1060801.name: Peering Through a Key

1060811.desc:
When Discarding a Skill, gain [AttackDmgUp] equal to the Discarded Skill Rank. (Max 3 per turn)
When other allies Discard a Skill, and if the ally's Discarded Skill Rank is higher than this unit's [KnowledgeExplored] value, this unit gains +1 [KnowledgeExplored].
1060811.name: Peering Through a Key

1060821.desc: After Attack: If the target is in a staggered or defeated state by an attack from 1 ally with the least SP, the ally heals 7 SP.
1060821.name: Enlightenment
